title: Recycling of New York City's Garbage Is Safer Than Incineration

body: LEAD: A 66-year-old retired worker at the Brooklyn Navy Yard was found murdered yesterday in his apartment near the yard. title: New York City Environment Cleared in Cleopatra's Needle Case
